item.description:
Don't want to go to a bar/club that cost $100...or wait around till midnite for fireworks...then join us for fireworks and dinner. There are fireworks @ 7pm on the Boston Commons. There are ice sculptures to view on the Boston Commons as well. We will go to Chinatown for dinner after the fireworks. Please be on time -meetup at 6:45 pm, the fireworks start at 7pm promptly.

If you already have plans, enjoy and have a Happy & safe New Years eve!
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide my cell phone to those that RSVP

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: NY's Eve
